---
title: 'FormGroup'
slug: 'react/components/form-group'
implementationOf: 'Form Group'
---

```jsx
<Form onSubmit={ data => alert(JSON.stringify(data, null, 4)) }>
    <FormGroup label="Personal Info">
        <FormText label="First Name" />
        <FormText label="Last Name" />
    </FormGroup>
    <FormGroup label="Credit Card Info">
        <FormText label="Credit Card Number" />
        <FormCheckbox label="Save Information" />
    </FormGroup>
    <FormGroup label="Shipping Info">
        <FormRadioGroup
            label="Shipping Speed"
            options={[
                { label: 'Same Day', value: 'same' },
                { label: 'Next Day', value: 'next' },
                { label: '3-5 Business Days', value: 'slow' },
            ]}
        />
    </FormGroup>
    <Button>Submit</Button>
</Form>
```
